class solution{ public int search(int[] nums,int target) { if(target < nums[0] || target> nums[nums.length-1]){ return -1; } int left=0,right= nums.length-1; while(left <= right){ int middle=left+((right-left)>>1); if(nums[middle]==target){ return middle; } else if(nums[middle]>target){ right=middle-1; } else (nums[middle]<target) { left=middle+1; } } return -1; } }
title: Binary Search
